corpus=[]
for i in range(len(X)):
    rev=re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]',' ',X['text'][i])
    rev=rev.lower()
    rev=rev.split()
    rev=[lemmatizer.lemmatize(word) for word in rev if word not in stopwords.words('english')]
    rev=' '.join(rev)
    corpus.append(rev)
